comments.author: norrisboyd@gmail.com
comments.body:
Created attachment 271860
Patch for changes to tests

comments.author: bob@bclary.com
comments.body:
I did a quick look and it looks fine, but can we hold off for a day or so? I am hopefully in the final stages of getting regression and fix detection working for Spidermonkey and don't want to mess up the failure messages at the moment.

As soon as I get the regression and fix detection working, I'll review and check in. Ok?

comments.author: norrisboyd@gmail.com
comments.body:
Bob, 

Can I commit these changes yet?

Thanks,
Norris

comments.author: bob@bclary.com
comments.body: I'm running a set of shell tests on 1.8.1, 1.9.0 with this patch applied. I'll let you know in ~hour?

comments.author: bob@bclary.com
comments.body:
Comment on attachment 271860
Patch for changes to tests

results look fine. please go ahead and check in.

description:
I've been implementing block scope (let), and needed to use the reportMatch 
function to generalize tests for both SpiderMonkey and Rhino error messages.

See attached patch. If don't see any issues with the patch I can commit it.
summary: More reportMatch changes to generalize tests
